Title: Perariyathavar
Writer: Bijukumar Damodaran (story), Bijukumar Damodaran, Bijukumar Damodaran
Actors: Govardhan B.K, Govardhan, Indrans, Suraaj Venjarammoodu
Plot: Film tells the story of marginalized people in Kerala through the life of a father who working as a temporary cleaner and his Eight year old son.
